subject: Re: [junit] DBC
msgSnippet: ... I do it at a document level, usually not even as javadoc (though I might start rethinking that)... the tests themselves express the contract. -- John
messageBody:
On Tuesday 02 April 2002 01:14 am, you wrote:
> Interesting to see that John Goodsen (private method thread) is using
> Design By Contract in conjunction with unit testing and JUnit. Is anybody
> else is doing this and how they are implementing DBC (iContract? JASS? or
> merely at a documentation level?)
>
I do it at a document level, usually not even as javadoc (though
I might start rethinking that)... the tests themselves express
the contract.

--
John Goodsen RADSoft / Rapid Software Delivery Specialists
jgoodsen@... eXtreme Java Internet Consultants
